title: Is New Jersey Now A Swing State? Trump Narrows Gap In Historic Blue Region
content: Donald Trump won the US Presidential election on Tuesday, defeating Vice-President Kamala Harris by 69 electoral votes. While Harris still carried New Jersey, Trump significantly reduced the gap from previous elections in the historically blue state.
